title: China gets poetic after Trump's latest currency attack
text:
China gets poetic after Trump's latest currency attack 9:28pm IST - 01:28 
China has said that information coming out of U.S. regarding the Chinese currency is ''a bit chaotic''. As Pascale Davies reports, it comes after President Trump accused China and Russia in a Twitter post of devaluing their currencies. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
China has said that information coming out of U.S. regarding the Chinese currency is "a bit chaotic". As Pascale Davies reports, it comes after President Trump accused China and Russia in a Twitter post of devaluing their currencies.
